content.body:
So, for example /streams/readable-streams/cancel.any.shadowrealm.html fails because it calls into RandomPushSource, defined [here](https://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/source/testing/web-platform/tests/streams/resources/rs-utils.js), which uses `setInterval`. 

I'm also still seeing some peculiarity in the wasm tests (mentioned previously [here](https://github.com/tc39/proposal-shadowrealm/issues/386#issuecomment-1819763999) -- I'm open to the possibility this is an implementation issue, but it would be good to have feedback that this is working in other implementations or not)
content.formatted_body:
So, for example /streams/readable-streams/cancel.any.shadowrealm.html fails because it calls into RandomPushSource, defined here, which uses setInterval.

I'm also still seeing some peculiarity in the wasm tests (mentioned previously here -- I'm open to the possibility this is an implementation issue, but it would be good to have feedback that this is working in other implementations or not)

content.body: Another one to note would be `/streams/readable-streams/owning-type-video-frame.any.shadowrealm.html` et.al can't run in a shadow realm because `VideoFrame` doesn't exist inside one.
content.formatted_body: Another one to note would be /streams/readable-streams/owning-type-video-frame.any.shadowrealm.html et.al can't run in a shadow realm because VideoFrame doesn't exist inside one.

content.body: given Rick's comment [here](https://github.com/tc39/proposal-shadowrealm/issues/386#issuecomment-1904918045) I wasn't sure how the champions wanted feedback
content.formatted_body: given Rick's comment here I wasn't sure how the champions wanted feedback
